item.description:
There are multiple abandoned bikes along London Road. These have been there since 30 Jan to yesterday.

item.title: Abandoned commercial bin, 6th January
item.description:
Commercial bins belong to business owners nearby keep moving their bins to the 7-13 Cresswell park residential building, blocking driveway and residential bins space. It has been moved there for over a month already and rubbish are building up.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cresswell Park, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish in the small layby., 6th January
item.description:
This rubbish is being dumped daily, and has been a problem for a number of years. It's getting worse and is a danger to passing motorists from foxes opening the rubbish. Dartford Council has stated in the past they have to close the road which is a problem, I pointed out the roads closed no problem for cyclists three times a year. I've also contacted Dartfords MP.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 12 inch wide pothole half filled, 6th January
item.description:
The pothole has been there for over 12 months. It has been half filled in and is a danger to cyclists.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Heavily soiled bedsheets in middle of road between 16 and 18 Elmcroft Road, 6th January
item.description:
Heavily soiled bedsheets thrown in middle of road. Requires urgent removal with safe ppe and disposal, and thorough sanitisation of area Between 16 and 18 Elmcroft Road in middle of road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Goddington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 6th January
item.description:
Street light in Selborne Road not working. Reported 23 December. Despite providing all the relevant information to the lighting department at their request on the non working street lamp in Selborne Road, I received notifications that it has been fixed. I further add these were not related to my report reference FixMyStreet ref: 8586818. THIS HAS NOT BEEN FIXED! The street lamp is on left approach to Marina House car park entrance and not where the indicator is. Normally the street lamps have a number on the front; I have taken a note of the number at the back of the one that is not working: GB13/89351. Please could you repair ASAP as the area is very dark without lighting. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Selborne Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin has been taken away from bus stop, 6th January
item.description:
For the last three weeks the greenwich waste bin has been missing from bus stop on White Horse Hill junction with Beanshaw. My garden is behind this bus stop and people are now throwing thier rubbish into my garden.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Jason Walk, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incredibly Icy New Pavement, 6th January
item.description:
The brand new paving that has been recently been put down on the junction of Melbourne Grove and Grove Lane is like an absolute ice rink. It is so much more slippery than any of the older paving around it on Melbourne Grove. I witnessed many people slipping and a cyclist came off his bike as he turned the corner. This paving was put down as part of the Low Traffic Neighbourhood initiative to promote cycling and walking... and its achieving the exact opposite as its so slippery.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melbourne Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect signage not removed, 6th January
item.description:
Sign with incorrect opening times on post (behind No Parking) not removed. Signage on gate has been replaced with correct times, however the emergency contact No. of 999 is NOT appropriate. The Police will not want to know about IDVerde failing to open gates. Suggest this correct times sign is replaced with IDVerde No. and Bromley Council out of hours No together with Ward Security No. Just think 3rd time lucky!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tent Peg Lane, Petts Wood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
